Class.name: SearchingDirectory
Class.summary: Represents a readonly structure for specifying a directory to be searched, including optional parameters.

Instance.name: Path
Instance.summary: Gets the path of the directory to be searched.
Instance.value: The path of the directory to be searched.

Instance.name: RecurseSubdirectories
Instance.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore the file if it does not exist (default is false).
Instance.value: A value indicating whether to ignore the file if it does not exist (default is false).

Instance.name: MaxRecursionDepth
Instance.summary: Gets or sets the maximum recursion depth when searching subdirectories (default is Int32.MaxValue).
Instance.value: The maximum recursion depth when searching subdirectories.

Instance.name: IgnoreIfNotExists
Instance.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore the directory if it does not exist (default is false).
Instance.value: A value indicating whether to ignore the directory if it does not exist.

Ctor.name: SearchingDirectory[EntryPath]
Ctor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure with the specified directory path.
Ctor.param: The path of the directory to be searched.
